Trade/Device Name(s): eSensor® Cystic Fibrosis Carrier Detection System
eSensor® Cystic Fibrosis Carrier Detection Kit
Regulation Name(s): CFTR (cystic fibrosis transmembrane conductance regulator) gene mutation detection system
Analyte(s): Selected panel of 23 cystic fibrosis mutations in the CFTR gene
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for eSensor® Cystic Fibrosis Carrier Detection System using multiplex PCR and electrochemical detection to genotype CFTR mutations from whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative genotyping assay for detecting cystic fibrosis carrier status in all adult couples contemplating pregnancy, not for prenatal screening or CF diagnosis
